description: These dongers all use an upside down A character (∀) for their mouths. These are some of the most classic and original Japanese emoticons. It looks best if this mouth is paired with some eyes that sit up high, such as with ‘. The smiles are wide and their mouths are open in delight, but these happy dongers are a little more toned down than the triangle mouths found in the section above.
title: Upside Down A Mouths
